name: Smith Mainline MIPS Cycling Helmet - Unisex
description: Confidence inspiring protection for going big and fast. The Mainline MIPS is Smith's first full-face helmet, providing the comfort of a half shell with extra coverage. A combination of Koroyd and MIPS dispurse impacts effectively in the case of a crash and tons of vents keep you cool while climbing. Instead of a rotational dial, interchangeable pads of varied thicknesses allow you to get a proper fit, and can be washed after hot and sweaty rides.MIPS technology reduces rotational forces to the head in the event of a fall, lessening the potential damage to the brain.Koroyd and EPS provide consistent energy absorption to disperse impacts in the case of an accident.AirEvac ventilation system pulls warm air from in front of your face to reduce fog build-up on glasses.21 vents provides breathability to keep your head cool.Adjustable visor for shading and goggle storage.Multiple sized pads can be swapped out for the perfect fit.
